headline.main: Trump Apologises for Lewd Talk Caught on Live Microphone in 2005
headline.print_headline: Trump Apologises for Lewd Talk Caught on Live Microphone in 2005

docs.snippet: Donald Trump issued an apology on Friday after the release of a video in which the Republican presidential candidate was recorded on an open microphone in 2005 talking in vulgar terms about trying to have sex with women....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump issued an apology on Friday after the release of a video in which the Republican presidential candidate was recorded on an open microphone in 2005 talking in vulgar terms about trying to have sex with women.

headline.main: Trump's Crude Remarks Put Running Mate Pence in Awkward Spot
headline.print_headline: Trump's Crude Remarks Put Running Mate Pence in Awkward Spot

docs.snippet: Mike Pence has long described himself as a "Christian, a conservative and a Republican in that order."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Pence has long described himself as a "Christian, a conservative and a Republican in that order."

headline.main: Texas AG 'Gratified' as Fraud Lawsuit Against Him Collapses
headline.print_headline: Texas AG 'Gratified' as Fraud Lawsuit Against Him Collapses

docs.snippet: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton said he is "gratified" that a federal judge dismissed civil charges alleging that he duped people into investing into a tech startup, as he continues to fight criminal charges pertaining to the matter in state cou...
docs.lead_paragraph: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton said he is "gratified" that a federal judge dismissed civil charges alleging that he duped people into investing into a tech startup, as he continues to fight criminal charges pertaining to the matter in state court.

headline.main: Why Republicans Are Probably Stuck With Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Republicans, Like It or Not, Are Probably Stuck With Trump as Nominee

docs.snippet: Unless he becomes incapacitated or quits, getting rid of him is, legally and logistically, “the equivalent of a triple bank shot.”...
docs.abstract: Q&A examines logistics of removing Republican presidential nominee Donald J Trump from ticket, which some party leaders have called for in response to 2005 video that captures candidate making lewd comments about women.
docs.lead_paragraph: Unless he becomes incapacitated or quits, getting rid of him is, legally and logistically, “the equivalent of a triple bank shot.”

headline.main: Greek Air Traffic Controllers Cancel Planned Strikes
headline.print_headline: Greek Air Traffic Controllers Cancel Planned Strikes

docs.snippet: Greek air traffic controllers have canceled a plan for successive 24-hour strikes next week after meeting with the country's transport minister....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greek air traffic controllers have canceled a plan for successive 24-hour strikes next week after meeting with the country's transport minister.

headline.main: Man With Chainsaw Kills Woman, Hurts Another in Shopping Mall in Belarus
headline.print_headline: Man With Chainsaw Kills Woman, Hurts Another in Shopping Mall in Belarus

docs.snippet: A young man armed with a chainsaw and a hammer entered a shopping center in Minsk, the capital of Belarus, and killed a woman and wounded another on Saturday evening, a spokesman for city police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A young man armed with a chainsaw and a hammer entered a shopping center in Minsk, the capital of Belarus, and killed a woman and wounded another on Saturday evening, a spokesman for city police said.

headline.main: Medics Dash to Rural Haiti as Cholera Kills 13 in Matthew's Wake
headline.print_headline: Medics Dash to Rural Haiti as Cholera Kills 13 in Matthew's Wake

docs.snippet: Cholera has killed at least 13 people in southwest Haiti in the wake of Hurricane Matthew, officials said on Saturday, as government teams fanned out across the hard-hit southwestern tip of the country to repair treatment centers and reach the epi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Cholera has killed at least 13 people in southwest Haiti in the wake of Hurricane Matthew, officials said on Saturday, as government teams fanned out across the hard-hit southwestern tip of the country to repair treatment centers and reach the epicenter of one outbreak.

headline.main: ECB Could Hit Inflation Target by Late 2018, Early 2019 - Draghi
headline.print_headline: ECB Could Hit Inflation Target by Late 2018, Early 2019 - Draghi

docs.snippet: Euro zone inflation could approach the ECB's target by late 2018 or early 2019 and so far there is no evidence that super-easy monetary policy is leading to asset price bubbles, European Central Bank President Mario Draghi said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Euro zone inflation could approach the ECB's target by late 2018 or early 2019 and so far there is no evidence that super-easy monetary policy is leading to asset price bubbles, European Central Bank President Mario Draghi said on Saturday.

headline.main: NYC Prosecutor Releases Report on Fatal Police Shooting
headline.print_headline: NYC Prosecutor Releases Report on Fatal Police Shooting

docs.snippet: In a rare move, a New York City prosecutor has made public a 71-page, detailed report of a fatal police shooting of a man authorities say was armed....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a rare move, a New York City prosecutor has made public a 71-page, detailed report of a fatal police shooting of a man authorities say was armed.
